text: Roger Miller (born Roger Wesley Miller) was a Major League Baseball pitcher. Miller was drafted by the Milwaukee Brewers in the fifteenth round of the 1972 Major League Baseball Draft and played at the Major League level with the team in 1974. Miller died in an acetylene tank explosion in 1993 at the age of 38.The Deadball Era ==References== Category:People from Connellsville, Pennsylvania Category:Milwaukee Brewers players Category:Major League Baseball pitchers Category:1954 births Category:1993 deaths Category:Baseball players from Pennsylvania Category:Accidental deaths in Pennsylvania Category:Industrial accident deaths
title: Roger Miller (baseball)
